description: This table contains electronic birth certificate information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: CHILD_SUF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The child suffix category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Sr.


Jr.


II


III


IV


V

columns.name: MOM_RES_APT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother residence apartment number.

columns.name: MOM_STAT_RES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's residence state/territory/country category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MOM_EMAIL
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother email.

columns.name: MOM_MAIL_APT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother mailing apartment number.

columns.name: MOM_MAIL_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's mailing state/territory/country category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_STAT_RES_C_NAME

columns.name: MOM_SUF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's suffix category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CHILD_SUF_C_NAME

columns.name: MOM_BIRTH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's birth state/territory/country category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_STAT_RES_C_NAME

columns.name: DAD_SUF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The father's suffix category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CHILD_SUF_C_NAME

columns.name: DAD_BIRTH_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The father's birth state/territory/country category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_STAT_RES_C_NAME

columns.name: PUB_CHILD_NM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this child's name should be published for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MOM_HISP_ORGN_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother's Hispanic origin other comment.

columns.name: MOM_RACE_TRIBE_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother's tribe.

columns.name: MOM_RACE_ASIAN_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother's race other Asian comment.

columns.name: MOM_RACE_PC_ISL_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother's race other Pacific Islander comment.

columns.name: MOM_RACE_OTHER_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother's race other comment.

columns.name: DAD_HISP_ORGN_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate father's Hispanic origin other comment.

columns.name: DAD_RACE_TRIBE_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate father's tribe.

columns.name: DAD_RACE_ASIAN_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate father's race other Asian comment.

columns.name: DAD_RACE_PC_ISL_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate father's race other Pacific Islander comment.

columns.name: DAD_RACE_OTHER_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate father's race other comment.

columns.name: PLN_HM_BIRTH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this birth was planned to deliver at home for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PUB_CHILD_NM_YN

columns.name: PLACE_OCCUR_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate place where birth occurred comment.

columns.name: ATTENDANT_NPI
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate attendant NPI number.

columns.name: ATTENDANT_TITLE_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate attendant title other comment.

columns.name: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's transfer status category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: MOM_TRANS_FROM
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate area from which the mother was transferred. This item is free-text.

columns.name: FIRST_PN_VISIT_DT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate date of first prenatal care visit. This date is stored as free-text to capture unknown values. Expected format is MM/DD/YYYY, where zeroes can be substituted for any unknown month, day, or year.

columns.name: LAST_PN_VISIT_DT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate date of last prenatal care visit. This date is stored as free-text to capture unknown values. Expected format is MM/DD/YYYY, where zeroes can be substituted for any unknown month, day, or year.

columns.name: MOM_HEIGHT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate mother height. Format: ft/in.

columns.name: MOM_PREPREG_WEIGHT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate pre-pregnancy weight.

columns.name: MOM_DELIVERY_WEIGHT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate delivery weight.

columns.name: MOM_WIC_FOOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's 'Special Supplemental Nutrition Program for Women, Infants and Children' food status category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME

columns.name: CIG_BEFORE_PREG
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate number of cigarettes/day 3 months before pregnancy.

columns.name: CIG_TRIMESTER_1
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate number of cigarettes/day during first trimester.

columns.name: CIG_TRIMESTER_2
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate number of cigarettes/day during second trimester.

columns.name: CIG_TRIMESTER_3
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate number of cigarettes/day during third trimester.

columns.name: PRINCIPAL_PMT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The principal source of payment category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Medicaid


Private Insurance


Self-pay


Tricare or other Military Insurance


Other


Unknown

columns.name: PRINCIPAL_PMT_SRC_CMT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate principal source of payment -- comment for other.

columns.name: RISK_FACTORS_DIABETES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's diabetes risk category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Prepregnancy


Gestational

columns.name: RISK_FACTORS_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mother's hypertension risk category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Prepregnancy


Gestational


Eclampsia

columns.name: RSKFC_PREV_CSECT
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate number of previous caesarian deliveries risk factor.

columns.name: FORCEPS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The 'forceps attempted?' category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME

columns.name: VACUUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The 'vacuum extraction attempted?' category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME

columns.name: PRESENTATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The fetal presentation category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cephalic


Breech


Other


Unknown

columns.name: ROUT_AND_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The route and method category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Vaginal/Spontaneous


Vaginal/Forceps


Vaginal/Vacuum


Cesarean with trial of labor


Cesarean without trial of labor


Cesarean unknown trial of labor

columns.name: CHILD_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The child's transfer status category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME

columns.name: CHILD_TRANS_TO
columns.description: Electronic Birth Certificate area to which the child was transferred. This item is free-text.

columns.name: CHILD_ALIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The child's living status category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME

columns.name: CHILD_BREASTFED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The child's breastfed status category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MOM_TRANSFERRED_C_NAME
